text: Itipurbe tomadera jan'ya ekati nidarsana esechila du'i sain'yadalera mukhomukhi ha'oyaya -- ekadala yud'dha karachila allahâ€Œra pathe, ara an'ya dala abisbasi, era cokhera dekhaya tadera dekhechila nijedera dbiguna. Ara allah tamra sahayya diye madada karena yake tini icche karena. Nihsandeha ete siksaniya bisaya ache drstibanadera jan'ya.
